from __future__ import division
t1 = random.randrange(0,24, 1) / 10 t2 = random.randrange(3,8,1)
vav = (2*((t2)**2 - (t1)**2) - 3*(t2-t1))/(t2 - t1)
problem.p: The position of a point, moving along a straight line is given by \( x(t) = 2t^2 - 3t - 4 \) where all coefficients are assumed to have the SI units.
Find the average velocity (m/s) of the point between t1 = $t1 seconds and t2 = $t2 seconds.
In the first t seconds of motion, the displacement of the point is 54 m. What is the average velocity (m/s) during that time interval?
During the first t seconds of motion, the average velocity of the car is zero. Find t.

choicegroup.choice: There is no such value of t.
